summary: Manages post‑treatment follow‑up for bladder‑cancer patients, deciding between initiating palliative care for metastatic disease or scheduling a one‑year follow‑up appointment for non‑metastatic cases.
business_intent: Automates post‑treatment decision‑making to provide timely palliative care for advanced bladder cancer and ensure appropriate long‑term monitoring for other patients, supporting clinical workflow and patient outcomes.
